message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $110 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $65?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $65. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $90. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit, but $90 is still a bit much for me. How about $75?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $85. It's still a great price for this amazing product, and I think you'll really love it!
